title: Toyota Taisor Limited Edition launched at Rs 10.56 lakh
description: Toyota has launched its second festive season special, the Taisor Limited Edition. The compact SUV, which is essentially a Toyota-badged Maruti Fronx, gets a complementary accessories package that adds cosmetic changes both outside and inside. The Limited Edition will be available until October 31 only. Taisor Limited Edition gets Toyota accessories worth Rs 20,160 Available only with the turbo-petrol engine Taisor Limited Edition is priced between Rs 10.56 lakh and 12.88 lakh Toyota Taisor Limited Edition: what’s new? The Taisor Limited Edition gets Toyota Genuine Accessories (TGA) worth Rs 20,160. On the outside, this includes front and rear under spoilers in granite grey and red colours, door sill guards, chrome garnish around the headlamps, front grille, and side moulding. Inside the cabin, the Limited Edition adds door visors, all-weather 3D mats, and door lamps. Toyota Taisor Limited Edition: price, powertrains Considering the accessories pack is complementary and that the Limited Edition is only available with the 100hp, 1.0-litre turbo-petrol engine – with 5-speed manual and 6-speed torque convertor automatic options – the limited-run model’s price range is Rs 10.56 lakh-12.88 lakh, ex-showroom, Delhi. The standard Taisor also comes with a 90hp, 1.2-litre petrol engine with manual and AMT options, and a 78hp CNG-powered version in manual form only. The Taisor Limited Edition, like the recently launched Hyryder Festival Edition, is meant to boost Toyota’s sales during the festive season.  Also see: Toyota developing mini Fortuner to rival Scorpio, Roxx Toyota returns to F1 as Haas partner Toyota dealer sees 50 percent surge in hybrid sales post tax waiver in UP
author: Rivan RS
excerpt: All Taisor Turbo variants are now available with a complementary accessories package.

html:
All Taisor Turbo variants are now available with a complementary accessories package.

Toyota has launched its second festive season special, the Taisor Limited Edition. The compact SUV, which is essentially a Toyota-badged Maruti Fronx, gets a complementary accessories package that adds cosmetic changes both outside and inside. The Limited Edition will be available until October 31 only.

  1. Taisor Limited Edition gets Toyota accessories worth Rs 20,160
  2. Available only with the turbo-petrol engine
  3. Taisor Limited Edition is priced between Rs 10.56 lakh and 12.88 lakh

Toyota Taisor Limited Edition: what’s new?

The Taisor Limited Edition gets Toyota Genuine Accessories (TGA) worth Rs 20,160. On the outside, this includes front and rear under spoilers in granite grey and red colours, door sill guards, chrome garnish around the headlamps, front grille, and side moulding. Inside the cabin, the Limited Edition adds door visors, all-weather 3D mats, and door lamps.

Toyota Taisor Limited Edition: price, powertrains

Considering the accessories pack is complementary and that the Limited Edition is only available with the 100hp, 1.0-litre turbo-petrol engine – with 5-speed manual and 6-speed torque convertor automatic options – the limited-run model’s price range is Rs 10.56 lakh-12.88 lakh, ex-showroom, Delhi.

The standard Taisor also comes with a 90hp, 1.2-litre petrol engine with manual and AMT options, and a 78hp CNG-powered version in manual form only.

The Taisor Limited Edition, like the recently launched Hyryder Festival Edition, is meant to boost Toyota’s sales during the festive season. 

Also see:

Toyota developing mini Fortuner to rival Scorpio, Roxx

Toyota returns to F1 as Haas partner

Toyota dealer sees 50 percent surge in hybrid sales post tax waiver in UP
